content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line
Consists of two stone furnaces at:
- Furnace 1 at position(0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position(2.0, 0.0)
Both furnaces are working on iron ore to iron plate conversion

### Copper Plate Production Line
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at position(4.0, 4.0) converting copper ore to copper plates

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line
Located around position(9.5, 11.5), consists of:
- Input chest at position(6.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Burner inserter at position(7.5, 11.5) moving materials from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at position(9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position(11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at position(12.5, 11.5) storing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System
Located around position(-7.0, 24.5), consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) providing water
- Pipe network carrying water (fluid system 5126)
- Boiler at position(-7.0, 24.5) converting water to steam
- Steam pipe network (fluid system 5128)
- Steam engine at position(-2.5, 24.5) generating electricity
- Electric pole network connecting various entities

### Research Facility
Located around position(0.5, 30.5), consists of:
- Lab (position not specified)
- Burner inserter at position(0.5, 30.5)
- Input chest at position(0.5, 31.5) containing science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Resource shortage errors
- Check inventory for coal before attempting to insert into entities
- Keep track of coal levels and harvest more when running low

### Assembly machine warnings
- Ensure all required ingredients (copper cable, iron plates) are available in correct quantities for electronic circuit production
- Monitor input chest inventory levels to maintain continuous production

### Power system management
- Maintain coal supply in boiler to ensure consistent power generation
- Monitor steam and water levels in the pipe systems
